definition: to treasure/to be very fond of
handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]
surname Zhong
variant of 鍾|钟[zhong1]
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Poems by Wordsworth , Gorge Gordon Byron and John Keats have long been favorites.
sentences.chinese: 華茲華斯，拜倫，濟慈的詩歌一直爲人們所鍾愛。

sentences.english: You are my fondest wish and my brightest dream.
sentences.chinese: 你是我最鍾愛的希望和最耀眼的夢想。

sentences.english: Many actress love the see-through blouses very much.
sentences.chinese: 很多女明星對透視裝鍾愛有加。

sentences.english: How I love your peaceful eyes on me!
sentences.chinese: 我鍾愛你的目光，將我的心輕觸。

sentences.english: I shall examine a favorite theme of Dostoevsky.
sentences.chinese: 我將考察陀思妥耶夫斯基所鍾愛的一個主題。

sentences.english: His stage name stands for "Ladies Love Cool James."
sentences.chinese: 他的藝名代表着“女士鍾愛酷詹姆斯”。

sentences.english: Did you know that Dachshunds were a favorite breed among Royalty?
sentences.chinese: 你是否知道臘腸犬曾經是皇室成員所鍾愛的犬種呢？

sentences.english: Do you have a kiddie pool that you and your kids really love (or loved)?
sentences.chinese: 你有鍾愛的或者你孩子非常喜歡的兒童泳池嗎？

sentences.english: Despite preferring to fight on horseback, these heavily armoured archers have dismounted to fight on foot.
sentences.chinese: 重裝弓騎兵儘管鍾愛騎馬廝殺，但有時亦會步行作戰。

sentences.english: There are two other reasons why prime lenses are the available-light photographers' friends.
sentences.chinese: 此外攝影家鍾愛定焦鏡頭還有另外兩個原因。

sentences.english: I have a special love affair with Kandinsky.
sentences.chinese: 我也特別鍾愛康定斯基。

sentences.english: A Comparative Research on the Three Bird Poems of Wordsworth, Shelly and Keats;
sentences.chinese: 華茲華斯，拜倫，濟慈的詩歌一直爲人們所鍾愛。

sentences.english: In this song, the hunter likens himself to the beautiful blackbird loved by the deer.
sentences.chinese: 在歌中，獵人將自己比作鹿所鍾愛的美麗山鳥。

sentences.english: The materials for making a button can be many, and "corozo" has always been my favourite.
sentences.chinese: 鈕釦的材料種類繁多，果實鈕一直是我最鍾愛的類別。

sentences.english: Do you have any favorite painters or artists?
sentences.chinese: 你有鍾愛的畫家或者藝術家嗎？

sentences.english: Those young people can keep their precious Internets.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人可以繼續泡在他們鍾愛的網上。

definition: to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom)/to long for sth day and night
to feel strongly about/to be fond of/obsession/deep commitment
(lit.) to fix one's gaze on/(fig.) to show interest in/(favorable) attention/favor
to be partial towards sth/to favor/to prefer/preference/favorite
first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
to love ardently/to adore
true love
to love sth too much to part with it (idiom); to fondle admiringly
to be infatuated with/to be enchanted by/to be passionate about
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
precious
popular/well-received
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
to admire
to have a special fondness (for sth)
